import { useState } from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', message: '', } export const Contact = (props) => { const pagesDefinition = require("../data/data.json") const [{ name, email, message }, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } const clearState = () => setState({ ...initialState }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(name, email, message) emailjs .sendForm( /*Aporte por Eduardo Lopez*/ 'service_1vdyokl', 'template_cfezfvo', e.target, 'mWbyNq2B-DwTvYApy' ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text) clearState() }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

{props.data ? props.data.title : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.paragraph : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.titleContact : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.textAddress : ''} {props.data ? props.data.address : 'loading'}

{props.data ? props.data.textPhone : ''} {' '} {props.data ? props.data.phone : 'loading'}

{props.data ? props.data.textEmail : ''} {' '} {props.data ? props.data.email : 'loading'}

  • {pagesDefinition.instagram.length > 0 && }
  • {pagesDefinition.whatsapp.length > 0 && }
  • {pagesDefinition.twitter.length > 0 && }

{pagesDefinition.titleComments}

© {props.data ? props.data.textDesignBy : ''}{' '} {props.data ? props.data.designBy : ''}

) }
